name: Shooting Gallery (itch) (Anto)
description:
Welcome to Shooting Gallery! Introduction

A shooting arcade game where you have to get as many points as possible without
failing any target.

You can take a look at the code or even download the entire Unity Project at GitHub!

Controls

Right Click or R Key -> Reload

Left Click -> Shoot

Esc -> Pause Menu

Special Thanks

Gun Model, UI Elements and CrossHair Sprite by Kenney

Particles and Level Textures by Unity

Sounds from Universal Sound FX

Loading Sprite by CodeManu

Backgrounds by CraftPix
